title: Help Center and Support
subtitle: Quickly find answers to your questions about GoldWen and discover how to get the most out of your experience.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Answers to the most common questions about GoldWen.

daily_selection.question: How does the daily selection work?
daily_selection.answer: Every day at noon, our algorithm suggests 3 to 5 carefully selected profiles based on your preferences, compatibility and values. This approach prioritizes quality over quantity for more meaningful encounters.

conversations_24h.question: Why do conversations disappear after 24 hours?
conversations_24h.answer: This feature encourages spontaneous and authentic exchanges, avoiding the accumulation of inactive conversations. It pushes to create real connections quickly and reduces anxiety related to pending messages.

smart_matching.question: How does smart matching work?
smart_matching.answer: Our algorithm analyzes your values, personality and preferences to identify the most compatible profiles. We prioritize deep compatibility rather than superficial criteria.

calm_technology.question: What is the 'Calm Technology' philosophy?
calm_technology.answer: GoldWen adopts the principles of 'Calm Technology': minimalist interface, predictable interactions, limited notifications. The goal is to reduce anxiety and create a soothing experience.

contact_support.question: How to contact support?
contact_support.answer: You can contact us via our contact page or directly by email at support@goldwen.app. We usually respond within 24 hours with personalized solutions.

contact_section.title: Can't find the answer?
contact_section.description: Our team is here to help you personally. Don't hesitate to contact us directly.
